collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (28 total Queries, 28 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul> <li>A recent change of senior management;</li> <li>A significant change in ownership; </li> <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li> <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li> </ul></i> ', '', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p>', 'yse', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p>\r\n<p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p>\r\n<p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide. In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p>', '', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p>\r\n<p><i>N.B. If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p>\r\n<p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p>', 'yes', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p>', '', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p>', 'yes', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p>', '', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p>', 'yes', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p>', 'yes', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p>\r\n<p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>\r\n<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p>\r\n<p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings. Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p>\r\n<p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

INSERT INTO `tbl_c1` (`question`, `yesno`, `comment`, `code`, `c1tID`, `type`, `status`, `added_on`) VALUES ('<p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p>', 'YES', 'None', 'AC1', '1', 'cacf', 'Active', '2024-04-08 14:32:52')

session.name: Davies John
session.allowed:
stdClass Object
(
    [add] => Yes
    [edit] => Yes
    [acin] => Yes
    [clm] => Yes
    [cl] => Yes
    [sd] => Yes
    [audm] => Yes
    [aud] => Yes
    [frm] => Yes
    [sett] => Yes
    [dash] => Yes
)

post.question:
Array
(
    [0] => <p>Have the terms of engagement not yet been agreed?</p><i><p>If any of the following factors are relevant to this audit assignment, a new letter of engagement should be issued:</p><ul>
        <li>A recent change of senior management;</li>
        <li>A significant change in ownership; </li>
        <li>A change in the financial reporting framework adopted in the preparation of the financial statements; or</li>
        <li>A change in other reporting requirements.</li>
    </ul></i>



    [1] => <p>Has the A.E.P. or other key audit principals been in the role for 7 consecutive years <i>(for listed, PIE and other regulated companies? )</i></p>
    [2] => <p>Has a partner (including the engagement partner and engagement quality reviewer (EQR), joined the client in a key management position, and has less than two years elapsed since the end of the last audit that they worked on?</p>
<p><i>Careful consideration should be given as to whether this is the most appropriate course of action and clear reasoning given if the firm decides to continue in the engagement.</i></p>
    [3] => <p>Will total recurring fees for client or where they are part of a group, the group exceed 10% of the gross practice income?</p>
<p><i>N.B. This limit is not established in the Code of Ethics issued by IESBA, but is recommended by a number of audit regulators worldwide.  In the event that fees exceed this limit, it should be clearly documented why it is still appropriate for the firm to continue to act as auditor</i></p>
    [4] => <p>Are there fees outstanding which are substantially in excess of our normal credit terms?</p>
<p><i>N.B.  If outstanding fees are in excess of normal credit terms, document the period in question.</i></p>
<p><i>Consideration should also be given to work in progress where billing has been deferred ~ document the amount and period in question.</i></p>
    [5] => <p>Have the actual amount of the fees for the preceding audit, along with terms for the payment, not yet been agreed?</p>
    [6] => <p>Have any contingent fee arrangements been agreed in respect of any services?</p>
<p><i>NB: Audit work cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis, neither can non-audit services if the contingent fee is material to the firm, or the outcome of the non-audit services is dependent upon a future audit judgment. Tax services cannot be undertaken on a contingent fee basis where the fee is dependent on the proposed application of tax law which is uncertain or has not been established</i></p>
    [7] => <p>Does the audit firm or any network firm act as company secretary or director for the audit client or associated undertaking?</p>
<p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p>
    [8] => <p>Does any partner or director of the audit firm or network firm act as company secretary or director to the company or associated undertaking, in either an official or unofficial capacity?</p>
<p><i>NB: If the answer to this question is yes then no safeguard can be implemented which would enable the audit to be undertaken.</i></p>
    [9] => <p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) hold any shares or other beneficial interest in the client?</p>
    [10] => <p>Is a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) a trustee of a trust that owns shares in the client?</p>
    [11] => <p>Is there any loan or other financial arrangement between a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) and the client?</p>
    [12] => <p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) purchase goods or services from the client in the ordinary course of business where the value of the purchase is material to either party?</p>
    [13] => <p>Does a person who can influence the audit (or a member of their close or immediate family) have close family or personal relationships with the client?</p>
    [14] => <p>Are we aware of any conflicts of interest?</p>
    [15] => <p>Are we involved in, or threatened with, any litigation with this client?</p>
<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p>
    [16] => <p>Have we, or any other person who can influence the audit, accepted or been given gifts or hospitality by the client in excess of that acceptable under the firm’s criteria?</p>
    [17] => <p>Are we acting for a parent undertaking of a group, preparing consolidated financial statements, where we only act for an insignificant proportion of the group?</p>
<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm should consider not accepting the engagement.</i></p>
    [18] => <p>Is there any indication that the directors may impose a limitation of scope resulting in a disclaimer of opinion being issued on the financial statements (PSA 705.13(b)(i))?</p>
<p><i>NB: Where this is the case the audit firm cannot accept the engagement.</i></p>
<p><i>NB2: Where in preceding periods a disclaimer of opinion has been given arising from an imposed limitation of scope (irrespective of whether the firm acted as auditor for this period), directors’ written representations should be obtained that this situation will not arise again this year. </i></p>
    [19] => <p>Are we lacking the technical expertise and support and other resources to undertake this engagement?</p>
    [20] => <p>Has assessment of the integrity of the owners, directors and management given any cause for concern?</p>
    [21] => <p>Has the firm provided any valuation services (including litigation support and actuarial services) for the client that prohibit the audit from being undertaken?</p>
<p><i>NB: Valuation services can only be provided if they are immaterial to the financial statements or non subjective.</i></p>
    [22] => <p>Has the firm provided any prohibited services to an entity that has recently been acquired by the audit client? </p>
<p><i>N.B. The firm has no more than three months after the effective date of an acquisition to eliminate threats which could impair independence.</i></p>
    [23] => <p>Complete form Ac2 – Provision of Non-Audit Services to Audit Clients for all non-audit services to be provided by the firm, and any network firm to the audit client or any of its associated undertakings.  Do any of these services affect our service as auditors of this client? </p>
    [24] => <p>Do we know of any other factors that could affect independence or otherwise indicate that we should not accept this appointment?</p>
<p><i>For instance, this might include the situation where an individual who was employed by the client within the last two years has now joined the audit firm.</i></p>
    [25] => <p>Based on an overall assessment of threats on an individual and cumulative basis, would an objective, reasonable and informed third party conclude that the firm’s integrity, objectivity or independence are compromised? If so, the firm shall not act as auditor.</p>
)
